thread.title: Lou McClung: Owner of Lusso Cosmetics has fascinating studio, lab space in Lakewood (photos, videos)
thread.title_full: Lou McClung: Owner of Lusso Cosmetics has fascinating studio, lab space in Lakewood (photos, videos)

author: Allison Carey, The Plain Dealer
title: Lou McClung: Owner of Lusso Cosmetics has fascinating studio, lab space in Lakewood (photos, videos)
text: Lou McClung designs, demonstrates and produces Lusso Cosmetics from his makeup showroom and factory and he restores statues and runs the Museum of Divine Statues from the old school building and the church of the shuttered St. Hedwig parish in Lakewood's Birdtown.
